Description:
UNDER OFFER
Positioned for complete convenience is this beautiful 4-bedroom home in peaceful cul-de-sac seclusion only minutes from Morradoo and Crib Point train station, shops and schools.
Here contemporary living is easily achieved with an impressive open and free-flowing floorplan with two separate living areas and a stylish kitchen boasting Blanco stainless steel appliances, a built-in pantry an additional breakfast bar with pendent lights. With enough space for the whole family, the home comprises of 3 generous bedrooms with built in robes serviced by a family bathroom plus a master suite with built in robes and ensuite.
Further luxury is found outside with the covered alfresco entertaining complimented by drought-tolerant plantings, a Balinese hut and a bubbling five-seat outdoor spa.
On a decent 1044sqm approx. block, the property caters perfectly for a growing family and pets with a free-standing lock up garage and animal enclosure and side access to the backyard whilst an additional double lock up garage with remote access caters perfectly for two cars. The secured front fence keeps the property nice and private and leaves more space for children or animals to run around. This property is full of surprises with gas ducted heating and cooling throughout, perfect for all seasons.
Boating enthusiasts will appreciate the close proximity to Hans Inlet and Westernport Bay whilst the local primary school, nature parks and nearby town shopping offers every amenity at your doorstep.

Description:
Perfect
This low maintenance two bedroom unit located in Crib Point is an affordable option for entry into the thriving Mornington Peninsula property market for the smart investor or first home buyer.
The unit is finished in neutral tones and features two generous sized bedrooms both with walk in robes, open plan kitchen and living areas, bathroom with separate W.C. and laundry and is currently tenanted until August 2018 for $310.00 per week.
- Two bedrooms, both with WIRs
- Open plan kitchen and living areas
- Bathroom with separate W.C.
- Single lock up garage
- Low maintenance lifestyle, close to schools, shops and transport
For further information, contact Dominic Tallon on 0408 528 857.

Description:
Untapped Potential
This quarter acre (1012m2 approx) property is located in a quiet, leafy Crib Point street and the modest three bedroom home represents an excellent opportunity to create something really special.
Behind the picket fence and double gate there is a carport and plenty of space for parking extra cars, boats or the caravan. The home itself is neat and simple, the kitchen includes gas cooking appliances and overlooks the dining area, plus there is a generous sized family room and a sunroom to the rear of the home.
In the backyard there is a garden shed and aside from a few established trees, including a beautiful Norfolk Island pine, it is basically a blank canvas with all the space you need to make your extension or landscaping ideas come to life.

Address: 256A Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
Description:
Under Offer
Located in a private & leafy setting is this sizeable, vacant battle axe block and it is ready for your dream home! The generous allotment is approximately 717m2 and presents a golden opportunity to purchase vacant land in a well-established and desirable location, which is becoming extremely rare on the peninsula!
You'll find yourself situated within walking distance to the township, football oval, local pool, public transport, Crib Point Train Station, post office, the local primary school and all of the other amenities that Crib Point has to offer!
The Peninsula Link Freeway is also located within easy reach, with the nearest onramp city bound located approximately 17km (approx.) away, making a commute or trip to the city a breeze!
With an abundance of the peninsula's finest destinations located nearby, you will love the perfect positioning; with some of the best beaches, such as Somers, Balnarring & Merricks within close proximity (approximately 10km to Balnarring beach) you'll never find yourself short of things to do!
Land today is rare, and with a blank canvas of this size, you'll be spoiled for choice when it comes to selecting a design for your new home!
If you're ready to take advantage of the many perks of building your home, then please contact us today!

Description:
Immaculate Coastal Living With Spacious Interiors & Surrounds
UNDER OFFER IN 14 DAYS | Privately nestled at the rear of the complex, this wonderfully spacious unit will delight those looking for a blend of comfort, convenience and contemporary living.
In absolutely immaculate condition, there's nothing further to do except move in and immerse yourself within the welcoming community of Crib Point, where everything is easy to reach. Walk to local shops or public transport within minutes or take a leisurely stroll down to 'The Esplanade' coastal trail.
~ Two bedrooms with robes + king-size master bedroom featuring a walk-in-robe, ceiling fan and ensuite.
~ Move around effortlessly between living, dining and the modern kitchen with gas cook top, Omega dishwasher and an abundance of storage.
~ Glass sliding doors open onto the paved entertaining terrace, dog run and generous rear yard for those who desire space and whisper-quiet surrounds.
~ Split system heating and cooling in living zone.
~ Double garage with internal access and alarm system.

Within minutes to local schools and public transport, this is one you can't afford to miss! Make your move now & secure the perfect investment before it's too late.

Address: 4/278 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
Description:
Under Contract
If you have been searching for a cosy, low maintenance unit with the backyard and privacy of a house, then look no further!
With an appealing façade, tucked to the rear of the complex, this bright and natural light filled unit with all the modern conveniences you could need is the perfect first home, or downsizer for those seeking to take on the simple life in the quiet pocket of crib point. Situated just a short walk from public transport, the local primary school, pool & shops, and the bushland reserve, this property is positioned within arm's reach to all of the local amenities and sure to tick the location box on your search criteria!
As you enter the home, you are greeted with an open and inviting lounge area which wraps around to the dining & leads into the updated and neutral toned kitchen, which features electric appliances and offers an outlook onto the beautiful greenery of the established backyard. Adjoining the kitchen in a separate room is the laundry which features plenty of bench and cupboard space & has also been updated in line with the kitchen.
Located off the hallway, both bedrooms offer built in robes and are serviced by a separate toilet and main bathroom in original condition. The home also offers air conditioning/ceiling fans however is well insulated and stays cool during those hot summer days.
With dual access to the backyard from inside, either through the beautiful timber double doors from the dining area or accessible through the laundry to the paved, undercover outdoor entertaining area with built in BBQ facilities, you are sure to be impressed with the size of the yard on offer. Garden lovers will be pleased to see the established trees, including a fruit tree & Japanese maples, the rear of the property backs onto a laneway (Rowy Street) which provides rear access to the yard through double gates & boasts a beautiful bushy backdrop for the ultimate privacy and seclusion. To top it all off, the home has an enclosed single garage with access through to the backyard.

Description:
Unforgettable Elegance & Style In The Heart Of Town
Behind the picturesque facade of this captivating residence, you will find superbly proportioned interior spaces which brilliantly balance period elegance with family comfort.
~ Three bedrooms + study.
~ Gorgeous, stand-out kitchen offers a beautiful combination of stone and timber benchtops and stainless steel appliances.
~ Light filled lounge and dining with split system heating and cooling.
~ Semi-updated main bathroom and separate powder room for guest convenience.
~ Anchored by hard wood flooring, an abundance of windows and high ceilings with traditional cornices.
~ The front yard is encased by a tranquil oasis of landscaped gardens and a choice of two sun decks to enjoy your morning cup of tea.
~ Garden shed, solar panels and a huge entertainers deck.
~ Side access to the property via the laneway, ideal for storing a truck, boat or caravan behind the secure sliding gate. Or, better yet, erect a large shed or carport (STCA.)
The location could not be more convenient, with the town centre and transport on your doorstep, it offers undeniable appeal for first home buyers, tradespeople and growing families.

Description:
CRIB POINT delight Build the Dream just under 1 Acre
Build your dream home on 1 Acre in the peaceful Crib Point. If Land is what you're after, this is for you!
This Property comes with a HUGE SHED plus a four-bedroom cottage.
A large, flat block of land located in the quiet streets of Crib Point represents a great opportunity for tradies, renovators, and families looking to upsize or renovate this original house.
Country style cedar home occupies this wonderful block with all its original fixtures and fittings, four Bedroom two living areas, central kitchen, front & back verandah and gas coonara. There is definitely potential to renovate and create a beautiful family home.
Outside features a veggie patch, fruit trees, wood sheds, chicken house and a HUGE SHED with mezzanine plus an office/studio perfect for those working from home, tradies needing storage or those with plenty of toys.
Contact Exclusive Agent, Richard Whitehead on 0412 328 718.

Description:
Under Offer
An enormous allotment of approximately 1012 m2 ensures this well-presented, original family home offers an exciting array of future options for those seeking to renovate or extend, simply land bank & live, or even redevelop STCA set in a quiet leafy location. This substantial family home comprises three sizeable bedrooms all with built in robes, plus an additional study or fourth bedroom. The central timber kitchen offers electric appliances adjoins to the L-shaped lounge room and overlooks the separate dining zone.
Aspiring entertainers will be delighted by the large backyard with established gardens, the perfect setting by which to host family and friends on a summers afternoon. A double lock up garage and cooling all complete the package. This outstanding opportunity is made even better by its prized location, within easy reach of Morradoo Train Station, public transport and local shops.

Description:
Auction Wednesday 13th Dec 5.30pm ! Reserve Set $350,000
This well-loved family home with its timber cabin charm & plenty of potential, is ready for a re-vamp!
Situated behind secure fencing, just a short walk from public transport, the local primary school, pool & shops, and the bushland reserve, it's quiet and leafy location which will be sure to please.
The home comprises of three bedrooms, one of which adjoins the main bathroom to form a semi ensuite is sizeable and features a built in spa bath, shower and basin facilities. All Bedrooms are carpeted with built in robes & ceiling fans. At the rear of the home is the Large, open plan living & Dining area with a Conara, built in cabinetry and sliding doors which open out to the deck. The kitchen comprises of gas cook top and range hood and plenty of cupboard space.
The outside of the home boasts a shed which will accommodate up to 4 cars and all the rest! With plenty of covered storage options this property is ideal for those who like to tinker!
Set to be auctioned on Wednesday the 13th of December at 5.30pm, get in quick before this golden opportunity is gone!
Disclaimer: This property is being sold without an oven.

Address: 302 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
Description:
UNIQUE OPPORTUNITY!
2 Substantial brick buildings originally designed for educational use and now in need of substantial works for residential conversion OR demolish to make way for a completely new development.
Both buildings (one split level) feature truss roof construction, colourbond clad roof and aluminium windows with brick fence to front and sealed car park adjacent to Stony Point Road. Rear access off 12 meter wide unconstructed Government Road.
Zoned General Residential under the Mornington Peninsula Planning Scheme and subject to Design and Development Overlay # 19 which restricts accommodation to a maximum of 4 dwellings (STCA).
Terms 10% Deposit. Balance 60 days. Vacant Possession
Contact Richard Whitehead 0412 328 718 or Chris Watt 0417 588 321 for inspection and tender documents.

Description:
The Ultimate Lifestyle Property on 1882sqm approx!
Contact Sean Crimmins for your private inspection 0411 734 814
Situated in a quiet and leafy pocket of Crib Point, this home is perfect for those downsizing from acreage though still after privacy and creature comforts, or those after some space and lifestyle with the possibility of subdivision (STCA).
Features Include:
- Period appointments and features combined with modern living
- 2 large bedrooms with built in robes
- Light and bright aspect
- Premium gas heated Blue Marlin in-ground pool
- Enclosed outdoor entertaining with toilet/kitchenette servicing pool area
- Massive backyard with subdivision potential (STCA)
This unique property offers the astute buyer the lifestyle locale opportunities of wandering down to Wooleys Beach Reserve for a stroll or a paddle, mosey down to local cafes and general store and also the Crib Point Station which can get you to the city in just over an hour!
*photos taken prior to installation of glass pool fencing

Description:
Under Offer
Recently renovated & situated in an appealing and peaceful pocket of the peninsula township of Crib Point, this property could be the one you've been searching for!
On a fully fenced corner block of approximately 665sqm, offering dual access, Single carport off Lorimer Street or side access from Austin Court, to off street parking & a massive 7X9m shed. The shedding has plenty of room for up to 4 cars, or whatever else you wish to store!
The list continues as to why this property has it all, with the home having been recently renovated from top to bottom, it has all the luxuries and modern conveniences one could require! The stylish, light & bright kitchen with high quality cabinetry and stone benches, offers stainless steel Appliances, dishwasher and plenty of bench & cupboard space!
The home offers 3 bedrooms all with a built in robes, which are serviced by the main bathroom which has also been tastefully updated in line with the rest of the home. With split system heating/ cooling & ceiling fans, you'll stay comfortable all year round! The flooring has also been updated along with the light fittings and other minor touches.
No stone has been left unturned, inside and out, with a very large and simply fantastic entertaining area to the rear of the property, which overlooks the veggie garden and the rest of the beautifully landscaped outdoors and has room for the whole crew!
This is your opportunity to purchase a fantastic home the Mornington peninsula that has it all and you won't need to lift a finger!

Description:
Immaculate Property - Period Charm and Contemporary Comfort!
Situated in a prime location, only a stones throw from cafes, transport, schools and foreshore. This well presented home meticulously renovated, white retaining its period features is the perfect home for those starting out, downsizing or just after a coastal retreat.
Features Include:
- 3 bedrooms with built in robes
- Large open plan living/dining area
- Renovated kitchen with Cesar stone bench tops
- Stainless steel appliances and plenty of cupboard space
- Light and bright orientation
- Ample Laundry an undercover entertaining area and single garage.
